generated_description: james river reflections is a service establishment specializing in funeral celebrant services.

long_description: we plan and lead memorial services built to reflect a person's life. from there, we put together a service that weaves those stories into a reflection on the person's life and legacy. most families aren't quite sure what they want the service to look like. we are happy to work with you wherever you are in the planning process, and we're used to planning services with people who aren't used to planning services. our services are available within an hour's drive of richmond. the memorial service is a reflection of the stories of a person's life and of the ways that their stories connect to the larger reality. rob brown is a certified funeral celebrant through the insight institute and a board certified chaplain through the association of professional chaplains. the insight institute provides training and certification for life tribute professionals. we gather stories and memories from family and friends and design a personalized service that reflects the life of the individual. we lead the service at a venue chosen by the family to provide a time for people to come together to celebrate their loved one's life and grieve together.
